channel.title: Delta First Click Item Issue

item.title: Delta First Click Item Issue
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Are you sure it’s that piece of code causing the problem?

If so, check to see if it’s reading the right information, because a null is being returned somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta First Click Item Issue
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

I honestly don’t know what is wrong here if anyone of you see whats wrong with this code please tell me:

case 122: // Call for burying bones junk = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); ItemSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); ItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); server.potions.buryItem(ItemID, ItemSlot, playerId); break;

And whenever i click any item it throws this error in my cmd

Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Owner. java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:10714) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15654) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic
